Package tile

Class TileManager

java.lang.Object
tile.TileManager
public class TileManager extends Object

This class contains the tiles to be drawn on the screen and handles the logic for plowing and other tool commands.

Since:
2022-11-28

    • TileManager

      public TileManager(main.Board board, main.KeyHandler kh, logic.Collision colz)
      This constructor is invoked when a TileManager object is created.
      Parameters:
      board - The board or view class
      kh - The key handler class where key inputs are modified
      colz - The collision class that checks for collision on the tiles

    • updateTileGrid

      public logic.PlotGrid updateTileGrid(main.InfoBar menu)
      This method inputs the .txt file input into the PlotGrid.java class
      Parameters:
      menu - The InfoBar to be updated when this method is called
      Returns:
      PlotGrid It returns the updated PlotGrid

    • updateTileCopy

      public void updateTileCopy(logic.PlotGrid updatedCopy)
      This method updates the tiles for every instance
      Parameters:
      updatedCopy - The updated copy of the tile

    • getTileCopy

      public logic.PlotGrid getTileCopy()
      This method gets a PlotGrid
      Returns:
      PlotGrid the copy of the tiles to be modified

    • getTileImage

      public void getTileImage()
      This method is used to get the tile images such as the trees, rocks, crops, and plot lands.

    • loadMap

      public void loadMap(String fileName)
      This method is used to load the map automatically by painting the Board with the sprites breadth-first.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The filename of the map in .txt format

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2, boolean success)
      This is the draw() method, which allows us to "draw" tiles on the farm.
      Parameters:
      g2 - It accepts a Graphics2D object to modify the map
      success - It is used to check whether or not the action was successful

    • getTile

      public Tile[] getTile()
      This method gets the tile.
      Returns:
      Tile[] the current tile

    • getTileID

      public int[][] getTileID()
      This method gets the tile ID
      Returns:
      int[][] The tile ID in 2D array form [row][col]

    • setTileID

      public void setTileID(int[][] tileMapID)
      This method, when called, updates the tile ID
      Parameters:
      tileMapID - The tile ID in 2D array form [row][col]
